successes.title: RoBo 3D Printer
successes.description: The low-cost, open source, easy to use 3D printer we've all been waiting for. Help bring your ideas to life, one layer at a time.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU! You will be mentioned as a backer on our website to show our appreciation.
Get a RoBo 3D STICKER! Perfect for adding style to your laptop, notebood, or hometown. Also mentioned on our website. FREE shipping within USA
Get a custom RoBo 3D t-shirt! You will also be mentioned as a backer on our website. FREE shipping within the USA
1 lb PLA plastic filament. Get printing with your choice of Black, Red, Silver, Blue, Clear, Yellow, glow in the dark, or Natural color filament. Add $10 for shipping.
Get all the RoBo 3D printed parts to get started on building your own printer! Add $10 for shipping
5 Nema 17 Motors. 48 oz torque, 1.8 degree stepper motors. Get started on building your own printer! Add $15 for shipping
Hot end. Included: wires to hook up to electronics board.
ABS Kit. An 8.4x12.6 inch heated bed,thermistor, thermal barrier, wires, and screws.
Bobblehead of YOU! Use 123D catch to create a 3d model of your head and we'll print you out a personalized bobblehead.
Electronics Kit. A fully assembled electronics board with 4 stepper drivers.
Get a fully assembled and calibrated RoBo 3D Printer delivered to your doorstep. Includes everything you need to plug in and start printing! Add $48 for shipping

*Early Bird Special* As a thank you for helping us get started, get a fully assembled and calibrated RoBo 3D Printer delivered to your doorstep. Includes everything you need to plug in and start printing! Add $48 for shipping
A non-assembled RoBo 3D printer. Get all the parts ready for you to build yourself! It's fun! Add $48 for shipping
